name: Reason/Imagination
description: ‘Reason/Imagination’ is the third in our current series of studio prints that focus on ‘Process’. The print centres on an illustrated cross section of an embryonic seed. The text reads: ‘Reason is the natural order of truth; but imagination is the organ of meaning’ — C.S. Lewis Edition of 100 numbered prints. 420(mm) x 594(mm). Satin Gold Foil Blocking 120gsm Ability Offset Stock Click the photo to view larger. View more images

name: Stella Polaris
description: Stella Polaris is a print of a paper star that had greater ambitions. We started with six sheets of A4 paper, a few scalpel blades and a willing intern. A few attempts later we had a ‘Star’ to photograph (image 4). The star was then duplicated twice, one of which was rotated 30º, the other scaled. Edition of 100 numbered prints. 420(mm) x 594(mm). Litho Single Colour - pms 877 (silver) GF Smith 160gsm Naturalis stock. Printed by Team Impression. Click the photo to view larger. View more images
